attributes.action: COVID -19  Vaccination for all education staff
attributes.additional_details: After reading what Mat Hancock and other governing bodies propose, if/when the Covid19 vaccination is approved and ready for mass roll out. Within the propossel, it is stated that children will not be vaccinated, if this is true,  then I feel it is the governments duty to protect the very people that are providing the education for the children.  Like other front line workers,  the teachers have been there when the parents and the government needed them throughout this pandemic.
attributes.background: I/we would like the government to provide a Covid19 vaccinations to all educational staff, when  a vaccination is approved.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554316
